rules_text:
Break [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature.)[/i]
Other creatures you control have break.
When creatures you both own and control named Sena, Ouroboros Ogre and Lanz, Ouroboros Defender attack, once per game you may exile them, then meld them into Sena’s Ouroboros. It enters tapped and attacking.
